channel.title: Dragonious 317 Server, We Hope You Will Have Fun Playing Dragonious
channel.description:
Dragonious is a server where you can skill, train, pk, compete with friends, have fun, chill-out and make more friends. We are currently in the early stages of our servers creation so if there are any bugs/glitches please report them to a staff member. It may be hard during these early stages as of such the staff will help you through these early stages of the server to try and allow you to have a wonderful experience. We hope you will at least try out Dragonious :)
The In-game commands train, duel and home work however, vote and donate are currently being fixed as well as some shops. Here are some links for Dragonious:
Forum: Free forum : http://dragonious.forumaroc.net/ Vote: Vote for Dragonious - http://www.runelocus.com/top-rsps-li...99-Dragonious/ Download Client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/its9hblbk3...nious.jar?dl=1
And of course here are some pictures to show you a little bit of Dragonious :D
Home: Gyazo - 00e7c087e9781a682cc13931427c7042.png Monster Teles: Gyazo - d8aaedfca35b387d8f0569531cc51bf3.png City Teles: Gyazo - ac9b0fe9ec85810275d5e35d563401f4.png Minigames: Gyazo - 345500b8dfc2dd0adc20ad13b172a4d7.png Pking Teles: Gyazo - 62e79f413ae1f2e771e121fdabcb029a.png Pk Store: Gyazo - d42cd4ff86c17534f07eb8e0b31ed72f.png Skilling tele: Gyazo - f066c88811177a81c5cb608adc637566.png Advanced Skilling: Gyazo - 72df08f2cda7accab3dff7d504bec6fb.png Skills: Gyazo - 3239dc617d06145b40126a6253950cdf.png Boss Teles: Gyazo - 6d9f3a789d983dfb6d4f487f18efcfc5.png Advance Boss Teles: Gyazo - 27beaf6f624f145376ff251e4395f535.png Working Curses: Gyazo - 4cb69415530ae7b05a43ee271dd53c9e.png Working Dice: Gyazo - 778505312ac3eb051a9a4a15feca7a6a.png Working Money Pouch Deposit: Gyazo - de4d65ec02039e26fcd1b6f62b06641c.png Working Money Pouch Withdraw: Gyazo - 92ed70050a2101221d594f65fc3405af.png Donator Options: Gyazo - 95f7b07a210b737d2c415c67f67458b9.png Donator Island: Gyazo - b84ecac5ef9538e751b04ce1c56e1acf.png Donator Shop: Gyazo - 1260c1f6aa1618c411cd0e93cfc4302d.png Vote Shops: Gyazo - 79b75c01e24e4b6914bfb6612277a5d8.png Skilling/Combat Shops: Gyazo - 966ad9e6037b18adff7056f055b4490b.png
Thank-you for your time looking at our server advertisement, we hope to see you in the near future :)

item.title: Dragonious 317 Server, We Hope You Will Have Fun Playing Dragonious
item.dc:creator: @idek idek
item.description:
@idek wrote:

Dragonious is a server where you can skill, train, pk, compete with friends, have fun, chill-out and make more friends.
We are currently in the early stages of our servers creation so if there are any bugs/glitches please report them to a staff member.
It may be hard during these early stages as of such the staff will help you through these early stages of the server to try and allow you to have a wonderful experience.
We hope you will at least try out Dragonious

The In-game commands train, duel and home work however, vote and donate are currently being fixed as well as some shops.
Here are some links for Dragonious:

Forum: Free forum : http://dragonious.forumaroc.net/
Vote: Vote for Dragonious - http://www.runelocus.com/top-rsps-li...99-Dragonious/
Download Client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/its9hblbk3...nious.jar?dl=1

And of course here are some pictures to show you a little bit of Dragonious
